text: i need to convert HubSpot owner id's into a string containing their name. i have a deal object with HubSpot owner id's and i have an object with HubSpot owner id's and the user's corresponding full name. any advice on how to accomplish this elegantly?
assumes the id is the key and the full name is the value for the object

i moved the HubSpot tracking script out of HubSpot and into GTM. whats weird is before, HubSpot was only showing me a fraction of the traffic that GA was reporting. now that ive moved the tracking script the numbers actually seem to line up better. i have two questions:
1) are there any negative side effects to moving the tracking script to GTM?
2) what's the deal with the analytics being so different before i moved it?
